snippet: The journalists, cloistered in a hotel press room, did not see the rocket launching, or its spectacular failure minutes later.
abstract: Journalists invited to Pyongyang, North Korea, for gala celebrations and to witness rocket launching do not see the launching, or its spectacular failure; in a bizarre situation, journalists, who are cloistered in a hotel press room, learn about the event via messages from colleagues in South Korea and their editors at home.
lead_paragraph: The journalists, cloistered in a hotel press room, did not see the rocket launching, or its spectacular failure minutes later.

headline.seo: Journalists in Pyongyang Scooped by Launching’s Failure
headline.main: Journalists Invited to Pyongyang Are Scooped by Rocket Launching and Failure
headline.print_headline: Journalists Invited to Pyongyang Are Scooped by Rocket Launching and Failure
